entries.journal_entry_description: Vani Korr, a reporter for the Corellia Times, is investigating the Meatlumps and wants to discover the identity of the three brothers who are rumored to lead the Meatlumps. Help her to do so.
entries.journal_entry_title: Help Vani Korr Investigate the Meatlumps, Part 2
entries.task00_item_name: Distress signal from a Meatlump radio sent
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to one of the Meatlump camps outside and to the Southeast of Coronet, and use the radio there to send a distress signal. According to Vani Korr, a Meatlump lieutenant should respond to the signal.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Send a Distress Signal from a Meatlump Camp
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Vani Korr and let her know you failed to get the password from the Meatlump lieutenant.
entries.task03_message_box_text: After defeating the Meatlump lieutenant, you find he was carrying a notepad with only one small phrase written on the first page: password is meatlump.
